content: conjure a classic pointy witch hat in just one cozy afternoon this quick satisfying make uses bulky category 5 yarn for a sturdy shape and dramatic brim perfect for halloween festivals or year-round witchy vibes the pattern is written for an adult fit and includes easy sizing guidance so you can customize for child teen/adult small or adult large with simple tweaks confident-beginner friendly yarn bulky/super-bulky yarn for the black hat i used himalaya snow - 351 yards i needed 3 balls for the purple hat i used himalaya dolphin baby knit with two strands together - around 430 yards i needed 4 balls crochet hook size 8 mm/us l-11 crochet hook skills level easy/advanced beginner sizing child teen/ adult small adult large
